title: 6 Bedroomed Solid House on 9 Perches in DEMATAGODA
details:
DEMATAGODA – Owner built (not for Sale!) solid house on 9 Perches. Close to Baseline Road / Flyover.

2 Floors with provision for the Upper Floor to be also used separately.

3500 sq ft, 6 Bedrooms, 4 Bathrooms, 2 Kitchens with Pantry, Worker’s Room & Toilet.

Roller Shutters, Parking for 3 Vehicles. Dual Road Frontage!

No Brokers. 0772280690
